partintro.para: Util System Demo Plugin is provided in the web application type so that the contents of Util-System Service by which system resources can be checked can be seen at a look in the DashBoard type using the simpleweb-jquery plugin (jQuery UI Portlet) and the FusionChart Free service of the Chart plugin.
Install the util-system-demo plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The result of installation can be checked through the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run(mvn clean jetty:run) commands.

Util System Demo Plugin gathers the initial system information through Sigar when the server is initialized, and it should be noted that when there is no permission on the process being executed in the system (e.g. system process of linux) or when a PC-based security tool blocks checking process information (e.g. Incops), there is no problem in initialization and execution even though Sigar produces a warning message through a standard error output saying that access to the process is not allowed.

book.part:
System Utility Demo
The screens provided by Util System Demo Plugin is as follows.
Name Description
System Utility Test List Provides information on system related properties such as OS, Java JVM, CPU, and memory information in the portlet type.
Network Utility Test List Provides information on network status, and IP, MAC address and PortScan information in the portlet type.
SystemUsageInfo Test List Provides information on CPU usage volume and the process list in the portlet type.
SystemUsageChart Test List Shows CPU, memory and disk usage volume in the chart type.
